===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=さくらもち|桜|tr1=sakura|t1=cherry blossom|餅|tr2=mochi|t2=rice cake}}.<ref name="KDJ">{{R:Kokugo Dai Jiten}}</ref><ref name="DJR">{{R:Daijirin}}</ref>

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|さくら もち}}

# [[sakura]] [[mochi]]: mochi [[flavor]]ed with [[pickle]]d ''sakura'' [[blossom]]s, and with an {{m|ja|餡|tr=an||sweet bean paste}} filling; traditionally served for {{m|ja|雛祭り|tr=Hinamatsuri||Girls' Day}} on 3 March
